Data that matches QCEW sic industry_code with actual sic codes with description

Source: R/data.R
qcew_sic_des.Rd

Raw data version in data_raw/qcew_sic_match Also available on the BLS [website](http://www.bls.gov/cew/doc/titles/industry/sic_industry_titles.htm)

qcew_sic_des

Format

A dataframe with 1749 rows and 3 columns

  • csv_industry_code: string SIC_0** that matches to the downloaded sic csv format files

  • ewb_industry_code: string 0** that matches to the downloaded sic ewb format files

  • industry_title: "SIC XXX " and description of the matching industry

Details

Variables are as follows
